title: AI Incident Analyzer
description: Automates incident categorization, suggests resolutions, and generates summaries from ticket data using Excel + GPT + Python.

title: IT Asset Management Tracker
description: Dashboard to monitor IT assets, lifecycle, and costs with alerts and trend analytics. Export-ready visuals.

title: Excel + GPT Workshop Dashboard
description: Reusable templates that turn spreadsheets into AI-assisted tools (generate insights, clean data, draft emails).
